subtitle: life
is truly a paradox
full of contradictions
we're not comfortable with paradoxes we
like consistency
we like things to be simple seamless
smooth but life is a paradox
on one hand we have great joys and
celebrations
on the other hand we can have great
tragedy and loss
god forbid we talked about silence and
sound
the deepest and most truest experiences
are hard to express the things we
express
easily are usually more superficial
we like to own things i want to have
control over it
but in truth the deepest
and the most real and enduring
experiences
you cannot own you can own a car
a home furniture
clothing but can you own truth can you
own your soul
can your own love can your own
eternal values can your own eternity
itself
these are experiences that we don't
control
yet we can access them so there's the
paradox
on one end we live our lives on the
surface level
where we think we have the illusion of
control
ownership definition
when in truth you go deeper you realize
the deepest truths of life
are not that defined subatomic particles
dna subcellular structures
the things that really are the building
blocks of existence they all defy
our senses
and the paradoxes keep going
so one of the key things is to come
to a place of peace at peace with the
paradox
to realize that life is not going to be
vanilla
or chocolate or one color or one musical
note
it's a combination of so many different
forces
look that ostensibly they all seem
disjointed but in truth
it's one narrative it's one flow
and learning to navigate the
vicissitudes to navigate the ups and
downs the twists and turns the trials
and tribulations
is the real key to a meaningful life to
our purpose for life
to a life of peace that's the ultimate
paradox to be at peace with the fact
that life is really not one of
animal bliss and total peace to be at
peace with the fact that things are
changing
and when you know how to navigate those
waves
you learn to master not master as an
ownership
but you learn to know how to travel and
have the confidence
to forge ahead
you
